problem.markdown:
size_num = "8 9 10"

size = "8" # user input

if size.isdigit() == False:
    print("Invalid: size should only use digits")
elif int(size) < 8:
    print("size is too low")
elif size in size_num:
    print("size is recorded")
else:
    print("size is too high")

The output of from running the above code is ___

( ) "Invalid: size should only use digits" ( ) "size is too high" ( ) "size is too low" (x) "size is recorded"

multiplechoiceresponse.p: The output of from running the above code is ___
